channel.title: CVE Feed for Anker -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Anker -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-25989|2024-09-16T17:17:56.263Z -- anker -- eufy%20homebase%202
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the libxm_av.so getpeermac() functionality of Anker Eufy Homebase 2 2.1.8.5h. A specially-crafted DHCP packet can lead to authentication bypass. An attacker can DHCP poison to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-26073|2024-09-16T16:24:20.724Z -- anker -- eufy%20homebase%202
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the libxm_av.so DemuxCmdInBuffer functionality of Anker Eufy Homebase 2 2.1.8.5h. A specially-crafted set of network packets can lead to a device reboot. An attacker can send packets to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-21806|2024-09-16T20:27:29.854Z -- anker -- eufy%20homebase%202
item.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the mips_collector appsrv_server functionality of Anker Eufy Homebase 2 2.1.8.5h. A specially-crafted set of network packets can lead to remote code execution. The device is exposed to attacks from the network.
